item.title: Entra Group Source of Authority CONVERSION: Enabling Cloud-First Identity Management
item.description: As organizations modernize their identity infrastructure, Microsoft Entra’s Group Source of Authority (SOA) Conversion feature enables a granular migration of group management from on-premises AD to Microsoft Entra ID without disabling sync or rearchitecting the entire directory. What Is Group Source of Authority? Group SOA defines where a group object is mastered either in on-prem AD or in Entra ID. With SOA conversion, administrators can selectively convert AD-synced groups into cloud-native groups, making them editable and governable directly in Entra ID.
